entry.title: Personalized Wedding Ring Bearer Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nannette Stewart
Type: Personalized Wedding Ring Pillow
Price: 69.99

Wedding Keepsake/Ringbearer Pillow. 12x12 Your choice color of text, color of flowers, and color of ribbon design. Has ribbon on back for ringbearer easy to slip hands under for carrying. Please be sure that we have the following information before you place your order: Bride & Groom Name Date & Time Place and/or City, State Color of Text Color of Flowers Color of Ribbon design

entry.title: Mother in Law Personalized Porcelain Tea Cup (teacup) and Saucer - Hand Decorated in the USA
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roses And Teacups
Type:
Price: 34.99

Our lovely "Catherine" style porcelain tea cup with "Mother in Law" in gold font.  Choose from a variety of floral patterns.  Both the teacup and saucer are hand decorated just for you!!!  Our artist apply each pattern by hand here in the USA and then kiln fires the porcelain before shipping to you.  This makes this item extra special for gift giving or collecting! Please allow a little extra time for decorating to allow him time for this process.

entry.title: Mother Personalized Porcelain Tea Cup (teacup) and Saucer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fielder Keepsake
Type: Porcelain Teacups
Price: 34.99

Our lovely "Catherine" style porcelain tea cup with "Mother" in gold font.  Choose from a variety of floral patterns. Both the teacup and saucer are hand decorated just for you!!!  Our artist apply each pattern by hand here in the USA and then kiln fires the porcelain before shipping to you.  This makes this item extra special for gift giving or collecting! Please allow a little extra time for decorating to allow him time for this process.

*The images shown are the floral patterns offered you may select from. The pattern image may show text other than Mother as this listing is for the Mother cup and saucer.  Will do have each you see in another listing.

entry.title: English Garden Personalized Favor Boxes Set of 24
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kate Aspen
Type: Wedding & Personalized Favors
Price: 51.99

  • Semigloss cardstock favor box in ivory, pink, purple, and green
  • Measures 3.3" w x 1.2" h x 2.4" d
  • Personalized coordinating quatrefoil sticker 
  • Some assembly required (stickers)
  • Contents not Included:  Add your own treats, soaps, tea lights, etc.

entry.title: Personalized Tea Cup and Teapot Note Cards Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roses And Teacups
Type: Tea Stationery
Price: 32.99

Personalize our Tea Note Cards with your own custom look!
Choose from our 5 Teacup Note Card Patterns, and let us know exactly what you would like to have printed on them. (Use the "comments" section as you checkout.)  We will send you an electronic proof of your note cards for your approval.
Note Cards are folded; 5.47 x 4.21 inches

Watermarks will NOT appear on your note cards!
Set of 20 Customized
Tea Note Cards with 20 White Envelopes

entry.title: Personalized Engraving on Stem
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Forever Rose
Type: Personalized Stem
Price: 15.00

Photos are magnified.  Engravings will be quite small.  Please DOUBLE check what you type into the box for your message.  There are NO RETURNS on engraved roses.  Thanks for your understanding!

entry.title: Set of 50 Personalized Victorian Bookmarks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Iprint
Type: Bookmarks
Price: 35.95

Our Bookmark Designs are created from special graphics which we have commissioned and/or purchased a license to use! They make wonderful gifts and favors, are easy to mail, and are very inexpensive!

Bookmarks are made from 14pt card stock with a clear UV coating. They are 2 inches by 6.5 inches in size.

These are perfect for "Save the Date" reminders!

To personalize:

***Simply add your text of choice in our comments boxes as you checkout. You will receive a proof of your text for your approval! In order for a custom order to be printed the proof must be approved so please be sure to check your email for this information.  If you do not receive a proof approval  email please contact customer service at 866-998-2877 or info@rosesandteacups.com Please allow 2-3 weeks or ask for RUSH shipping.***

Watermarks will NOT appear on your bookmarks! Click drop down box to select your pattern and then add to cart to purchase.

Personalize your tea bag favors with our custom stickers!
Our darling 1.5 inch round stickers fit perfectly on tea bags!
